about_the_game:
The shapez 2 Extended Soundtrack unlocks an additional 40 minutes of in-game music, as well as the full soundtrack.

The full soundtrack contains 80 minutes of sci-fi inspired electronic music written primarily by shapez 1 composer Petter Sumelius, with some tracks by Patrik Pettersson.

The Extended Soundtrack is part of the shapez 2 Supporter Edition.
detailed_description:
The shapez 2 Extended Soundtrack unlocks an additional 40 minutes of in-game music, as well as the full soundtrack.

The full soundtrack contains 80 minutes of sci-fi inspired electronic music written primarily by shapez 1 composer Petter Sumelius, with some tracks by Patrik Pettersson.

The Extended Soundtrack is part of the shapez 2 Supporter Edition.

name: shapez 2 Extended Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space

short_description: The shapez 2 Extended Soundtrack features more than an hour of relaxed music, perfect for building to!
